name: Rajesh Gupta
bio: Rajesh has over 15 years of experience in the culinary arts. He specializes in Indian cuisine, particularly North Indian dishes. His restaurant is known for its mouthwatering kebabs and biryanis.

name: Sunita Patel
bio: Sunita is a talented chef who has been in the industry for 10 years. She is known for her expertise in traditional Gujarati cuisine, and her restaurant offers a range of authentic vegetarian dishes, including dhokla, thepla, and khandvi.

name: Amit Sharma
bio: Amit is a chef with a passion for fusion cuisine. He has worked in several international kitchens, and his restaurant offers a unique blend of Indian and continental flavors. His signature dishes include tandoori chicken tacos and butter chicken pizza.

name: Neha Singh
bio: Neha is a young chef who has made a name for herself with her creative and modern approach to Indian cuisine. Her restaurant offers a range of innovative dishes, including a deconstructed version of the classic Indian dessert, ras malai.

name: Kunal Mehta
bio: Kunal is a chef who is passionate about street food. He has traveled extensively throughout India to explore the country's rich culinary heritage, and his restaurant offers a range of chaats, pani puris, and vada pavs.

name: Deepak Verma
bio: Deepak is a chef who specializes in seafood. He has over 9 years of experience in the industry, and his restaurant offers a range of delicious seafood dishes, including butter garlic prawns, tandoori pomfret, and fish tikka.

name: Sarika Choudhary
bio: Sarika is a chef who is passionate about health and wellness. She has a range of vegetarian and vegan dishes on her menu, including quinoa and lentil salad, vegan keema, and tofu tikka
